pages.title: 个人简介
pages.text: 王永才是中国人民大学计算机系副教授，博士生导师。主要研究兴趣包括物联网、机器人、手机移动大数据挖掘与分析，算法设计与分析， 在国际主流会议期刊上发表五十余篇文章，包括JSAC, ACM Computing Surveys, ACM Trans. on Embeded Computing,AAAI, IJCAI, MOBIHOC, INFOCOM, PERCOM, SECON，Ubicomp等，并获得了 Ubicomm2009 和 CWSN2011的最佳论文奖。研究成果在物联网，机器人人机交互、智能感知等领域取得广泛影响和应用。拥有10余项国内国际专利，多项技术转化成果。 招生信息 欢迎对网络优化，机器人感知研究感兴趣的直博生、普博生、硕士和工程硕士联系我 联系方式 电话 ：1八九10215881 电子邮箱：ycw@ruc.edu.cn 实验室主页：智能与网络优化实验室 教育经历 2014.02-2014.08，美国康奈尔大学，访问学者 2001-2006，清华大学自动化系，博士 1997-2001，清华大学自动化系，学士 工作经历 2015.08-至今，人民大学计算机系，副教授 2011.08-2015.08，清华大学交叉信息研究院，助理研究员 2009.08-2011.07，清华大学交叉信息研究院，博士后 2006.12-2009.08，NEC中国研究院，副研究员 研究方向 物联网算法与应用 机器人感知定位方法 手机大数据分析 网络与人工智能交叉学科 讲授课程 物联网算法与应用 运筹学 普适计算 课程链接：http://in.ruc.edu.cn 科研项目 紧耦合多源同步定位与地图构建的融合优化关键问题研究，国家自然科学基金，项目负责人，（No.62672524），01/2017-12/2020 人员活动检测传感装置加工合同，国家科技支撑计划子课题，项目负责人，2014BAK12B06，01/2016-12/2016 基于随身传感大数据的用户瞬时状态分析与特征分类，人民大学新教师启动项目，项目负责人，（No.2015030273）,01/2016-12/2018 稀疏多元传感器网络跟踪用电设备状态的序列解码与部署优化关键问题研究, 国家自然科学青年基金，项目负责人，(No. 61202360), 01/2013-12/2015 基于序优化的大规模无线定位与自标定方法研究,教育部博士点基金，项目负责人，(No. 20120002120003), 01/2013-12/2014 . 基于智能感知的智能生活, 国际合作项目，项目负责人，(No. 041902003), 01/2013-12/2014. 结合压缩采样与网络编码的无线传感器网络负载均衡与节能关键技术研究, 国家自然科学基金，项目骨干，(No.61073174), 01/2011- 12/2013 科研成果近期文章 Yongcai Wang, Tianyuan Sun, et al., Formation Tracking in Sparse Airborne Networks, IEEE Journal on Selected Areas in Communications (JSAC) 2018, IF 7.17 (CCF A) Tianyuan Sun, Yongcai Wang, et al., WCS: Weighted Component Stitching for Sparse Network Localization, ACM/IEEE Transactions on Networking (TON), 2018, Volume: 26 , Issue: 5 , Oct. 2018. Please enable JavaScript to use all the features on this page.Energy for Sustainable DevelopmentVolume 39, August 2017, Pages 1-12Monitoring and autonomous control of Beijing Subway HVAC system for energy sustainabilityAuthor links open overlay panelYongcaiWangaHaoranFengbXiangyuXibShow morehttps://doi.org/10.1016/j.esd.2016.12.004Get rights and contentAbstractAs the backbone of urban public transportation, subways are also major consumers of energy. More than 30% of the total energy is used to operate the heating, ventilating and air conditioning (HVAC) subsystems. If it were possible to reduce energy consumption of HVAC subsystems a few percent, a significant quantity of electricity would be saved. From 2012 to 2013, we conducted field studies and developed autonomous control system for saving energy of HVAC systems in Beijing subway stations. The energy consumption features and the load signatures of the HVAC systems were investigated and we deployed comprehensive environment monitoring, passenger flow monitoring and run-time data logging subsystems to monitor and investigate the above features in several metro stations. The extracted features showed a broad space for optimizing current HVAC systems' operation to save energy. Based on the insights learned from the field studies, we spent four months to develop and deploy autonomous HVAC control systems in three metro stations. Up to now, the developed autonomous control systems have worked well and the energy logs showed that the autonomous control system helped the metro stations reduce energy in a range from 20% to 38% than the conventional control strategy. We introduce key insights learned for energy saving and some future research directions.Previous article in issueNext article in issueKeywordsAutonomous controlAir conditioningHVACEnergy efficiencySustainabilitySubwayRecommended articlesCiting articles (0)© 2017 International Energy Initiative. posts.title: 解决latexdiff处理section改动出错的问题
posts.text: $$latexdiff 处理section, subsection时的问题 用latexdiff对两个tex文件进行了比较，得到记录变化的tex文档。但是在修改标题section和子标题subsection的时候会到一些问题。这是latexdiff自动生成的代码：1\subsection{\DIFdel{Experimental design of model domain sensitivity}} 编译时会出现如下错误 1234567891011121314151617Argument of \UL@word has an extra }. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Paragraph ended before \UL@word was complete. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Illegal unit of measure (pt inserted). \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}}Missing number, treated as zero. \subsection{\DIFdel{Path Planning}} 为解决这一问题，在latexdiff的命令中加入 1latexdiff --exclude-textcmd="section,subsection,subsubsection" temp.tex revise.tex > diff.tex 即可解决这个问题。 参考资料 latexdiff手册

posts.title: 用latexdiff实现修改的跟踪
posts.text: ##在texstudio中用latexdiff实现修改的跟踪。 首先要打开MikTex console，选择packages，查看latexdiff是否已经安装。 如果没有安装，则安装latexdiff，装好后，查看latexdiff结果如下： 安装好latexdiff之后，即可在windows命令行中，找到需要对比的两个文件： $ latexdiff template.tex template1.tex > diff.tex 对得到的diff.tex进行编译，既可以看到template.tex和template1.tex两个文件的差异。 参考资料

posts.title: 简单使用hexo的wikitten模板建立多级分类的方法
posts.text: 使用Hexo的wikitten 模板，建立起多级分类目录，简洁清晰。多级分类的建立也非常的简单。在模板之中都已经设计好多级分类的使用方法，最多支持四级。在写博客的时候只需要在文件头设置即可。 例如想要发布test.md，想让它属于 /技术/hexo/分类 这个三级目录下,只需要，在test.md的文件头位置： 1234categories: - 技术 - hexo - 分类 注意 - 后面要有空格。

posts.title: My new Post
posts.text: Quick Start创建一个新的页面1$ hexo new "My New Post" $$lim_{1\to+\infty}P(|\frac{1}{n}\sum_i^nX_i-\mu|<\epsilon)=1, i=1,…,n$$1$ hexo new "My New Post" $${ \frac{ {a^2} + {b^2} } {3} } $$$\frac{ { - b \pm \sqrt { {b^2} - 4ac} } }{ {2a} }$ 参考资料

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
